item.title: A Simple Favor Recap: What to Remember Before the Sequel
item.description: What do you need to remember about the original A Simple Favor before you watch the sequel? Screen Rant has you covered.

item.title: Recasting Michael B Jordan In The MCU: 10 Multiverse Characters For The Sinners Actor (Including His Childhood Marvel Dream Role)
item.description: Michael B. Jordan played Killmonger in the MCU, but with the multiverse, the Sinners star could return in a new role, including his Marvel dream hero.

item.title: Netflix Remake Of Iconic 1975 Japanese Action Thriller Debuts With Solid Rotten Tomatoes Score
item.description: A Netflix remake of an iconic 1973 Japanese action thriller has debuted with a solid Rotten Tomatoes score as it premieres on the streaming service.
